name: Diurnal Dusk
description:
You open your eyes to see that you have become a ghost. Figure out what happened by exploring the ghost town of Diurnal Dusk. But beware... Time is ticking. Listen carefully to the villagers. Find your way out.

Soundtrack

Programming - Sanjana Ravikumar, Lee Joshua, Joanna Yang, Aendri Singh

Audio - Sanjana Ravikumar

Art - Lee Joshua, Aendri Singh

Writing - Joanna Yang
